2FD432DE.VoiceDir74.789BF: Eager to help in whatever way she can, but feeling a bit guilty about how things have turned out. She knows she isn't in a position to help that much.

45AF6962.Line72.6D03F: You don’t owe us anything, but you are welcome to come.

880368E7.Line59.6D03F: We should get to Tarsarak. The people there know the deserts of Kehjistan well. Maybe someone has heard of this palace.

95E5952F.VoiceDir72.6D03F: Trying to ease Taissa's concerns--he doesn't want her to feel bad about what happened.

DF9E0711.Line74.789BF: Let me join you. I don’t know how much help I will be in this condition, but…I owe you my life.
